summary: After a strange storm in the Carribean causes a boat to sink, a family finds itself stranded on an island in the "27th dimension".
cast: Sam Behrens|Susanna Thompson|Lisa Jakub|David Gallagher|Jerry Hardin|Michael Reilly Burke|Naomi Watts|Sandra Thigpen|Dennis Neal|Michael Campillo|Jane Daly|Gustavo Laborie|Bob Bass
